Class FrogDanceCoordinator

java.lang.Object
  FrogDanceCoordinator

public class FrogDanceCoordinator
extends java.lang.Object

Class FrogDanceCoordinator Objects of the FrogDanceCoordinator class allow showing dance sequences involving Frog objects.

Author:
Anastasios Iliadis

 void createDance()
           
 int getNumOfMoves()
          Repeatedly prompts the user for a number of moves, until they enter a valid input representing a number in the range 1 to 3 inclusive, and then returns this number.

          Returns true if the argument is either "flip" or "slide", otherwise false.

          Returns true if the argument is in the range 1 to 3 (inclusive), otherwise false.
